title: One Little Bite
description: After a painful break-up with my cheating ex, I'm ready to flirt with someone who gives me tingles in all the right places. For the first time in months, I'm going to have some fun, no strings attached.   Leave it to me to go from a hot fling to profound heartbreak in one night.   This novella is only the beginning of Ricki and Calder's story. The culmination, Love Bites (Bitten, #4), will be available in Spring 2015.
author: C.C. Wood
